src:
Ryan Giggs Bicara Soal Tantangan Ekstra Solskjaer Sebagai Bos MU, Seperti Apa?
01 Nov 2019, 13:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mantan pemain Manchester United, Ryan Giggs percaya Ole Gunnar Solskjaer menghadapi tantangan yang lebih besar dalam usaha mengembalikan kejayaan Setan Merah. Tantangan ini muncul karena nama-nama pelatih top lainnya di Premier League.
Solskjaer mencoba meniru langkah Sir Alex Ferguson dalam membentuk MU. Dia menyukai pemain-pemain muda dan menerapkan gaya bermain ofensif.
Perkembangan itu jelas tidak mudah. MU menderita beberapa hasil buruk sejak awal musim, Solskjaer pun tertekan. Mereka baru bisa bangkit pada tiga atau empat pertandingan terakhir.
Giggs percaya yang paling penting bagi Solskjaer saat ini adalah menemukan konsistensi, bukan langsung mengincar trofi. Mengapa? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Ryan Giggs Talks About Solskjaer's Extra Challenge As MU Boss, Like What?
Nov 01 2019, 13:00 by Bola.net
Former Manchester United player Ryan Giggs believes Ole Gunnar Solskjaer faces a greater challenge in trying to restore the glory of the Red Devils. This challenge arises because of the names of other top coaches in the Premier League.
Solskjaer tried to imitate Sir Alex Ferguson's steps in forming MU. He likes young players and applies an offensive playing style.
Development is clearly not easy. MU suffered some bad results since the start of the season, Solskjaer was depressed. They can only rise in the last three or four matches.
Giggs believes that the most important thing for Solskjaer right now is finding consistency, not directly aiming for the trophy. Why? Read below, Bolaneters!
